name: NuGetToolInstaller
description: Finds or downloads and caches specified version spec of NuGet and adds it to the PATH.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version Spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version Spec of version to get.  Examples: 6.x, 4.x, 6.10.0, >=6.10.0

inputs.name: stableOnly
inputs.label: Stable Only
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether the version resolution will filter to stable only versions.

messages.Warning_NoUrlWasFoundWhichMatches: No download URL was found for %s
